title: Trimming, 18th century
medium: White, black, and colored silk in uncut velvet weave.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Three shields, each under a crown, showing a cross (red on white), a horse (?) under a tree (red, yellow, green, and black), and a double headed eagle (red, black, and white).

tombstone.epitaph: Trimming, 18th century.White, black, and colored silk in uncut velvet weave.. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-46.
